method.name: Prototype Selection based on Clustering

reference.ref: J.A. Olvera-Lopez, J.A. Carrasco-Ochoa, J.F. Martinez-Trinidad. A new fast prototype selection method based on clustering. Pattern Analysis and Applications, in press.

generalDescription.type: Preprocess Method. Data Reduction. Instance Selection. Incremental.
generalDescription.objective: Reduce the size of the training set without losing precision or accuracy in order to a posterior classification
generalDescription.howWork: PSC is based on clustering. It splits the training data sets into various clusters and selects the border points in clusters which are non homogeneous and interior points in homogeneous ones.

parameterSpec.param: Number of clusters: Number of clusters used in the process.
